quotes.quote: Success is a consequence and must not be a goal.
Success is a science;  if you have the conditions, you'll get the result.
Success is merely the process of fulfilling your own hopes and dreams— not by the standards set by society— but by the standards set by you.
If you can conceive it and believe it, you can achieve it.
The size of your success is determined by the size of your belief. Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper.
Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced everyday.
It is the accumulative weight of our disciplines and our judgements that leads us to either fortune or failure.
Average people look forward to 'getting off.' Successful people look forward to 'getting on.'
Success is not so much what we have as it is what we are.
Success is 20% skills and 80% strategy. You might know how to read, but more importantly, what's your plan to read?
Don't worry about being successful but work toward being significant and the success will naturally follow.
Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
Success will never be a big step in the future, success is a small step taken just now.
Action is the foundational key to all success.
There is only one success— to be able to spend your life in your own way.
The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success.
No success is worthy of the name unless it is won by honest industry and brave breasting of the waves of fortune.
A minute's success pays the failure of years.
Success has a great tendency to conceal and throw a veil over the evil deeds of men.
Success serves men as a pedestal; it makes them look larger, if reflection does not measure them.

People have a seed to success within them. Most never find it and therefore fail to reach their potential. Occasionally, a leader discovers it and helps that individual develop it. For both, they now can fulfill the purpose for which they are born.
Success is not a destination; it's a daily thing.
People are training for success when they should be training for failure.
The best leaders realize their success depends on their people.
Success comes to those who have an entire mountain of gold that they continually mine, not those who find one nugget and try to live on it for fifty years.
Success is the one unpardonable sin against our fellow.
Success is blocked by concentrating on it and planning for it...Success is shy— it won't come out while you're watching.
I am doomed to an eternity of compulsive work. No set goal achieved satisfies. Success only breeds a new goal. It is endless.
Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
